page.title: 15Stanground Fire Station
page.content: We visited Stanground Fire Station.It is near the main roads to{Farcet, {Whittlesey}and{Peterborough.}One of the firemen showed us the fire engines and other equipment and told us about the work that they do. The fire station was opened in 1977 and has twenty-nine men working there in shifts.They are called out about twenty-five times each week and training also takes place at the station.The men have keep fit lessons. As well as putting out fires,the men go out to rescue people from car crashes and they are trained to help in an air or train crash.They have special clothing and equipment which they must keep in good condition. The only other fire station in Peterborough is in{Dogsthorpe.}
